letter.head: Letter from De Erven F. Bohn to W. Blackwood and sons, January 22nd, 1873

body.p: We beg to apply to you the kind request for sending us one week before the publication one copy of Bulwer's novel: Kenelm Chillingly, His adventures and opinions, which book you have in the press, for what we are inclined to pay 30 £. When it were possible to send us already now the first volume by the post; it would be yet more agreeable. Mr H.A. Kramers at Rotterdam readily will be our pledge.
